cnbc.title: Trump says U.S. to ban large investors from buying homes
cnbc.summary: "I am immediately taking steps to ban large institutional investors from buying more single-family homes," Trump said.

cnbc.title: ICE agents fatally shoot woman in Minneapolis, DHS says
cnbc.summary: President Trump said an ICE agent appeared to have acted in self-defense by shooting the woman, but a man heard on video of the incident called it "murder."

cnbc.title: Trump says he will not permit dividends and stock buybacks for defense companies
cnbc.summary: Shares of General Dynamics, Lockheed Martin and Northrop Grumman each fell following Trump's comments.

cnbc.title: Alphabet's market cap surpasses Apple’s for first time since 2019
cnbc.summary: The positional inversion in market cap underscores the different directions Alphabet and Apple are heading with their respective AI strategies.

cnbc.title: Trump says Venezuela will purchase American products with revenue from oil deal
cnbc.summary: Energy Secretary Chris Wright said Wednesday that the U.S. will control Venezuela's oil sales indefinitely.

cnbc.title: JPMorgan Chase reaches deal to become Apple Card issuer as Goldman closes chapter on consumer foray
cnbc.summary: JPMorgan Chase has reached a deal to take over the Apple credit card from Goldman Sachs, according to a source.

cnbc.summary: Coatue and Singapore's sovereign wealth fund GIC are leading the financing

cnbc.title: Why Trump wants Greenland — and what makes it so important for national security
cnbc.summary: Greenland, a vast and sparsely populated self-governing Danish territory, has been thrust into the geopolitical spotlight once again.

cnbc.title: Nvidia's Jensen Huang would have to pay about $8 billion in proposed billionaire tax—he says that's 'perfectly fine' with him
cnbc.summary: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang has an estimated net worth of $166 billion, according to Forbes. A 5% tax on those assets would result in a bill over $8 billion.

cnbc.summary: Google and Character.AI are settling with families who sued the companies over alleged harm caused by AI chatbots.
